ai_buy_building_railway = {
	every_scope_state = {
		# limit = {
		# 	has_potential_resource = bg_gold_mining
		# }
		start_privately_funded_building_construction = building_railway
	}
}
ai_buy_building_railway = {
	every_scope_state = {
		# limit = {
		# 	has_potential_resource = bg_gold_mining
		# }
		start_privately_funded_building_construction = building_railway
	}
}



ai_build_privat_building_silver_mine = {
	every_scope_state = {
		limit = {
			has_potential_resource = bg_silver_mining
		}
		
		create_building = {
			building = building_silver_mine
			level = 5
		}

		# while = {
		# 	count = 5 #pour etre sure de tout construire
		# 	start_privately_funded_building_construction = building_silver_mine
		# }
	}
}
ai_build_privat_building_gold_mine = {
	every_scope_state = {
		limit = {
			has_potential_resource = bg_gold_mining
		}
		create_building = {
			building = building_gold_mine
			level = 2
		}

	}
	every_scope_state = {
		limit = {
			has_potential_resource = bg_gold_mining
		}
		while = {
			count = 5 #pour etre sure de tout construire
			start_privately_funded_building_construction = building_gold_mine
		}
	}
}
#building_gold_mine
ai_buy_building_gold_mine_1 = {
	every_scope_state = {
		limit = {
			has_potential_resource = bg_gold_mining
		}
		start_privately_funded_building_construction = building_gold_mine
	}
}
#building_gold_mine
ai_buy_building_gold_mine_2 = {
	random_scope_state = {
		create_building={
			building= building_ef_private_construction
			level    = $FC_SIZE$
			reserves=1
		}
	}
}

# #building_war_machine_industry
# ai_buy_building_war_machine_industry = {
# 	switch = {
# 		trigger = building_war_machine_industry_lvl
# 		1 = { 
# 			random_scope_state = { #random_scope_state
# 				limit = {
# 					or = {
# 						any_scope_building = {
# 							is_building_type = building_war_machine_industry
# 							level < 1
# 						}
# 						not = {
# 							has_building = building_war_machine_industry
# 						}
# 					}
# 				}
# 				create_building = {
# 					building = building_war_machine_industry
# 					level = 1
# 				}
# 				root  = {
# 					add_treasury = {

# ai_buy_building_coal_mine = {
# 	switch = {

# 		1 = {

# #building_sulfur_mine
# ai_buy_building_sulfur_mine = {
# 	switch = {
# 		trigger = building_sulfur_mine_lvl
# 		1 = { 
# 			random_scope_state = { #random_scope_state
# 				limit = {
# 					or = {
# 						any_scope_building = {
# 							is_building_type = building_sulfur_mine
# 							level < 1
# 						}
# 						not = {
# 							has_building = building_sulfur_mine
# 						}
# 					}
# 				}
# 				create_building = {
# 					building = building_sulfur_mine
# 					level = 1
# 				}
# 				root  = {
# 					add_treasury = {
# 						subtract = building_sulfur_mine_price_per_lvl_coast
# 					}	
# 					change_variable  = {
# 						name = 00_ai_buy_building_sulfur_mine_test 
# 						add = 1
# 					}
# 				}
# 			}
# 		}
# 		2 = { 
# 			random_scope_state = { #random_scope_state
# 				limit = {
# 					or = {
# 						any_scope_building = {
# 							is_building_type = building_sulfur_mine
# 							level < 2
# 						}
